message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.DC 

The paper discusses a new system architecture for securing and protecting IoT devices in home networks, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and computer networks (cs.NI). The system is based on NFV (Network Function Virtualization) and router/switching filtering capabilities, which are topics related to systems and control (cs.SY) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also mentions the use of ACLs (Access Control Lists), which is a topic related to distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
